faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quickly find answers to your questions
faq.answer1: Cloud hosting stores and manages data and applications on remote servers accessible via the Internet, offering flexibility and reliability with dynamically adjustable resources and data redundancy.
faq.answer2: With the growth of the Internet, digitizing services is becoming essential. That's where we offer quality services to ensure the best connectivity.
faq.question3: How do I choose my host?
faq.answer3: Consider factors such as server location, performance, stability, customer support, and price when choosing a cloud hosting provider.
faq.question4: What types of games can I host?
faq.answer4: You can host various types of games, including first-person shooters, role-playing games, survival games, strategy games, and many more.
faq.question5: What is the server connection speed?
faq.answer5: A speed test typically shows around 800mbits/s.
faq.question6: How can I manage my servers?
faq.answer6: Game servers are controlled using the open-source Pterodactyl panel, web servers with Plesk, and VPS with Proxmox.
faq.question7: What should I do after purchasing my server?
faq.answer7: Once you purchase your server, you will receive all the information to connect via email.
faq.answer8: JustMyHost guarantees a robust, scalable, and secure cloud infrastructure with 24/7 customer support.
faq.question9: How much does a server cost?
faq.answer9: Our offers start at less than €1!
faq.answer10: Of course, JustMyHost's support is available 24/7.

reviews.title: Customer Reviews
reviews.subtitle: What our customers say about us

contents.review1: Excellent experience with this cloud host! The VPS is fast, reliable, and performs superbly. Responsive and efficient customer service. Highly recommend for those seeking quality.
contents.review2: Very good host, they always respond when I need them. They are great and offer exceptional customer service, always attentive and responsive. Additionally, their platform is reliable and easy to use, with features that perfectly meet my needs.
contents.review3: Very responsive and attentive customer service, they helped me complete my configuration, and everything works great! I highly recommend it!
